00032 /* Hardware data types. Can be used to create MIDAS banks. Should
00033    be or'ed with standard data types like TID_DWORD | TID_LRS1882 */
00034 
00035 #define TID_LRS1882    (1<<8)   /* LeCroy 1882 fastbus ADC */
00036 #define TID_LRS1877    (2<<8)   /* LeCroy 1877 fastbus TDC */
00037 #define TID_PCOS3      (3<<8)   /* LeCroy PCOS 3 wire chambers */
00038 #define TID_LRS1875    (4<<8)   /* LeCroy 1875 fastbus TDC */
00039 
00040 /* Hardware data records */
00041 
00042 typedef struct {
00043    WORD data:12;
00044     WORD:4;
00045    WORD channel:7;
00046    WORD range:1;
00047    WORD event:3;
00048    WORD geo_addr:5;
00049 } LRS1882_DATA;
00050 
00051 typedef struct {
00052    WORD data:16;
00053    WORD edge:1;
00054    WORD channel:7;
00055    WORD buffer:2;
00056    WORD parity:1;
00057    WORD geo_addr:5;
00058 } LRS1877_DATA;
00059 
00060 typedef struct {
00061    WORD count:11;
00062    WORD buffer:3;
00063     WORD:1;
00064    WORD parity:1;
00065     WORD:11;
00066    WORD geo_addr:5;
00067 } LRS1877_HEADER;
00068 
00069 typedef struct {
00070   WORD data     : 12;
00071   WORD          : 4;
00072   WORD channel  : 6;
00073   WORD          : 1;
00074   WORD range    : 1;
00075   WORD event    : 3;
00076   WORD geo_addr : 5;
00077 } LRS1875_DATA;
00078 
00079 typedef struct {
00080   WORD          : 8;
00081   WORD count    : 6; 
00082   WORD          : 2; 
00083   WORD crate    : 8; 
00084   WORD tag      : 3;
00085   WORD geo_addr : 5; 
00086 } CAEN775_HEADER;
00087 
00088 typedef struct {
00089   WORD data     : 12;
00090   WORD overflow : 1;
00091   WORD underflow: 1;
00092   WORD valid    : 1;
00093   WORD          : 1;
00094   WORD channel  : 6;
00095   WORD          : 2;
00096   WORD tag      : 3;
00097   WORD geo_addr : 5;
00098 } CAEN775_DATA;
